title: Core Permitting Schema
description: Standardisation of the attributes collected from all permitting systems.

application_id.description: Unique ID of the submitted application for a permit

source_system.description: Acronym for the source system providing the permit tracking

source_system_id.description: Unique ID of the permit in the source system

project_id.description: ID of the project this permit relates to

agency.description: Acronym for the agency or ministry issuing the permit

business.description: Business domain, office or area responsible for the permit

application_status.description: Status of the application to obtain a permit

enum: Change Approval for Works in and About a Stream

permit_application_type.description: The form type for a permit or licence application

received_date.description: Date in which the application for permit was submitted

accepted_date.description: Date in which the review of the initial application's completeness concludes

tech_review_completion_date.description: Date in which the technical team concludes their review of the application

rejected_date.description: Date in which the permit is rejected

adjudication_date.description: Date in which the permit is adjudicated, approved or issued

amendment_date.description: Date in which the permit is amended

fn_consultn_start_date.description: Date in which the consultation with First Nations starts

fn_consultn_completion_date.description: Date in which the consultation with First Nations ends
